=UML class diagram=
[http://www.capponcino.it/alessio/files/universita/tesi-visual-netkit/uml/vn_plugin_framework-1.0beta.jpg http://www.capponcino.it/alessio/files/universita/tesi-visual-netkit/uml/vn_plugin_framework-1.0beta-thumb.jpg]

As you can see, all wheel around the `PluginRegistry` _Singleton_ class. This is the controller of mappings between BaseElement<-->[Plugin-1, ... ,Plugin-N] where BaseElement is a Virtual machine, Collision domain or a link.

The Registry offer a directory service to get and init a new plugins passing the plugin name. In this case, the loader fartory class initialize a new instance of the selected plugins returning a Proxy.
